title: 🔥Laws of Thermodynamics
desc: How does Bitcoin follow the Laws of Thermodynamics?

msgs.text: How does Bitcoin follow the Laws of Thermodynamics?

First Law The first law of thermodynamics states that, when energy passes into or out of a system (as work, heat, or matter), the system's internal energy changes in accord with the law of conservation of energy. Energy cannot be created or destroyed in an isolated system. Bitcoin can express how much energy was sacrificed in order to acquire a share of the total sum.

Second Law The second law of thermodynamics states that in a natural thermodynamic process, the sum of the entropies of the interacting thermodynamic systems never decreases. Another form of the statement is that heat does not spontaneously pass from a colder body to a warmer body. https://twitter.com/dergigi/status/1392409667058405376?s=20&t=a-5HGoTPDAzNjeDD-4sT-g
